title: Barcelona wonderkid Sergi Samper reveals he rejected Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger last summer
text:
'I did not even listen' Barcelona wonderkid Sergi Samper reveals he rejected Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger last summer 
The 21-year-old is at Grenada on-loan for the season but believes his future is with the La Liga giants and not at the Emirates By LEE ASTLEY Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments BARCELONA star Sergi Samper told Arsene Wenger he “did not want to listen” to Arsene Wenger’s offers last summer. 
The 21-year-old is at Grenada on-loan for the season to gain valuable first-team experience as Sergi Busquets , Andres Iniesta and Ivan Rakitic are ahead of his at the Nou Camp . Getty Images Sergi Samper rejected a move to Arsenal in the summer Getty Images Arsene Wenger wanted Sergi Samper at Arsenal but the defender rejected the offer Swansea 0-4 Arsenal : An easy day for Arsenal at the Liberty Stadium 
And the Spanish defensive midfielder revealed he turned down a move to the Emirates as he believes he still has a future at the Catalan club. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Sampa told Sport: "I did not want to even listen to Wenger. 
"I made it clear to him that I wanted to stay, that I wanted to triumph at Barca, that I was a Cule fanatic and that making it at Barca in the future would make me the happiest."
